title: Diet Camera - Food Tracker
summary: The Easiest Foodstagram App for Weight LossRecord your Meals with Silent Camera

descriptionHTML:
----------------------------------------------
Important Notice
End support service for Diet Camera
----------------------------------------------
Announcement on ending the support service for Diet Camera

We would like to extend our deep appreciation for a long patronage for Dietcamera, but we regret to inform you that we have stopped its support service since February 28 (Wed.), 2018.

Please be guided accordingly in the following details;

Subject application: Diet Camera
Date of effectiveness: February 28 (Wed.), 2018
Warning: In connection with ending the support service for Diet Camera, the download services of the upgrade from the App Store and Google Play have been discontinued starting February 28 (Wed.), 2018.

Thank you for your continuing support. We will always be at your service.
----------------------------------------------

The easiest personal diet assistant camera ever made! Record your dishes only a minute.
Want save your weight? You need to track foods everyday. This app makes your meals tracking easy as possible.

Nutrition tracker
- You only take food photos. Diet camera keeps you free from complexity memo.

No flash, No sound
- No flash camera adjusted brightness setting for the various dinner scene. Don't hesitate to shoot meals at the calm table. You can log beautiful dishes at once.

Weight graph & feedback
- Diet Camera shows you charts with photo since your last time.

Google Fit
- Sync weight with Google Fit

Smart Watch
- Compatible with all Android Wear devices
- 3 color watch faces
- Easy pedometer and weight graph
comments: Good, but needs improvements It has a nice clean interface, but lacks captions options for the photos. Also the edit time feature is terrible, limited to few hours before/after the meal. Why? If you didn't take a photo in the morning you just can't take a photo in the evening and adjust the time to fill the gap. Otherwise I really liked: fast, clean, pretty good app.

Camera and tracking good. Improvent opportunities should be examined. Great start. Takes pictures and allows for date editing. Would like to add notes. Form allowing nutritional info entry would be good. Would like to see other ways to review daily and/or weekly food intake. Can't add pic from library to show in group display.

Works ok for the first month Worked ok for the first month, now however the app crashes when ever I try and go back more than a week... It's a great idea, just wish the app worked! DON'T DOWNLOAD now I can't see anything... This has wasted a month of me tracking everything!
i rated it 1 star because of the new update. after i updated it, it just close immediately after i opened it and all my photos seemed to be erased. i rated it 5stars before since i really liked it
I like the simplicity of the app, and that it is not so goal focused. The time input thingy is a bit buggy, else it would get 5 stars. :D
I wanted to try this app... But as I open it crashes
recentChanges: - Bug fix for meal time graph and more
